# clone(recursive:)

**Instance Method**

Duplicates an entity to create a new entity.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func clone(recursive: Bool) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **recursive**: A Boolean that you set to `true` to recursively copy all the children of the entity. Otherwise, no descendants are copied.

## Return Value

The duplicate.

## Discussion

All component data is cloned automatically. If you clone an entity that stores custom data that’s not part of a component, override the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity/didClone(from:)] method to copy that data manually.

## Creating an entity

- **init()**: Creates a new entity.
- **didClone(from:)**: Tells a newly cloned entity that cloning is complete.
